import { useState } from 'react' import style from './Form.module.css' import Image from './img/Rick_y_Morty_Serie_de_TV-157026175-large.jpg' const Form = () => { const [userData , setUserData ] = useState({ email:"", password:"" }); const handleChange = (event) => { const property = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setUserData({...userData, [property]:value}) } return(
) } export default Form
